mapper.sql: UE.ID, UE.EMAIL, UE.FIRST_NAME, UE.LAST_NAME, UE.REALM_ID, UE.USERNAME, U.ROC_ID
mapper.select:
SELECT
from ESERVICE_ADM.DBO.USER_ENTITY UE JOIN ESERVICE.DBO.USERS U ON UE.USERNAME=U.USER_ID where USERNAME = #{username}

select ue.ID ID, ue.USERNAME USERNAME, ua1.VALUE EMAIL, ua2.VALUE MOBILE from ESERVICE_ADM.DBO.USER_ENTITY ue left join ESERVICE_ADM.DBO.USER_ATTRIBUTE ua1 on ue.ID=ua1.USER_ID and ua1.NAME='email' left join ESERVICE_ADM.DBO.USER_ATTRIBUTE ua2 on ue.ID=ua2.USER_ID and ua2.NAME='mobile' where ue.REALM_ID=#{arg0} and ue.USERNAME=#{arg1}

select user_id id, ESERVICE.DBO.fn_debase64(email) email, ESERVICE.DBO.fn_debase64(mobile) mobile, convert(varchar, last_chang_password_date, 111) last_chang_password_date from ESERVICE.DBO.users where last_chang_password_date is not null and convert(varchar, getdate(), 112) = convert(varchar, DATEADD(month, (#{arg0} - #{arg1}), last_chang_password_date), 112)

select user_id id, ESERVICE.DBO.fn_debase64(email) email, ESERVICE.DBO.fn_debase64(mobile) mobile, convert(varchar, last_chang_password_date, 111) last_chang_password_date from ESERVICE.DBO.users where last_chang_password_date is not null and convert(varchar, getdate(), 112) >= convert(varchar, DATEADD(month, (#{arg0}+1), last_chang_password_date), 112)
mapper.update: UPDATE ESERVICE.DBO.USERS set last_chang_password_date = null WHERE LOWER(USER_ID) = LOWER(#{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT TOP 1 PMDA_APPLICANT_EMAIL AS email, PMDA_APPLICANT_CELLPHONE AS mobile FROM ESERVICE.DBO.LIPMDA_ES WHERE (PMDA_INSU_TYPE + CONVERT(VARCHAR,PMDA_INSU_GRP_NO) + PMDA_INSU_SEQ_NO) = #{policyNo}

SELECT TOP 1 ESERVICE.DBO.FN_DEBASE64(U.EMAIL) EMAIL, ESERVICE.DBO.FN_DEBASE64(U.MOBILE) MOBILE FROM TRANS T LEFT JOIN ESERVICE.DBO.USERS U ON LOWER(T.USER_ID) = LOWER(U.USER_ID) WHERE T.TRANS_NUM IN (SELECT TRANS_NUM FROM ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS_MERGE WHERE TRANS_NUM_MERGE = #{transMergeNum})

select t.user_id id from ( select user_id, max(login_date) login_date from eservice.dbo.audit_log where login_status = 1 group by user_id ) t where DATEADD(month, (12 * #{lastLoginLimitYears}), login_date) <= getdate()
mapper.update: UPDATE ESERVICE.DBO.USERS set status = 'locked' WHERE LOWER(USER_ID) = LOWER(#{userId})
